•                     Claim Bill

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

PUBLIC

 

Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under reference 23/MO/17840 

 

May we request for the following details: 

•                     Photographs of the damaged cargo Attached

•                     Photographs (at the time of loading at the source and at the time of offloading at the final destination) Attached

•                     Response from the freight forwarder regarding the notice of loss sent 

•                     Claim Bill 

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar
